column4: I just did a dist-upgrade from oneiric to precise. While it was installing, gnome-shell quit working. After it rebooted, lightdm starts in a bad mode, and keyboard and mouse don't work. What should I do?
by "gnome-shell quit working" i mean it exited, but the upgrade continued without a WM.
I think I had a similar problem, ended up apt-get installing lxde until I could reconfigure gnome-shell
well, I can't even get to console, since the keyboard isn't working.
